about_the_game:
Wallpaper creator for Clip maker allows you to create wallpapers for the desktop and mobile applications in the easiest possible way.

Static wallpapers dimensions:

Standard PC / Mac (4:3): 640x480 800x600 1024x768 1152x864 1280x960 1344x1008 1280x1024 1400x1050 1600x1200 2048x1536

Dual/Multi Display: 2960x1050

Widescreen: 960x600 1024x640 1280x480 1280x800 1344x840 1440x900 1600x600 1600x1000 1680x1050 1920x1200 2048x768 2304x864 2560x960 2560x1024 2560x1600 3200x1200

iMac Resolutions: 1920x1080 2560x1440

All content of this DLC will be available directly from the game, in the menu where you are making settings of the timeline.

name: Wallpaper creator for Clip maker

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later (64-BIT Required!!!) It is not working on 32-BIT systems!
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Wallpaper creator for Clip maker have fun by creating your own cool wallpapers. Specially created for amateurs and artists to bring your stories to life.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese
